example.text: But House Republicans are threatening to default on our debt. This would result in devastation for our economy and millions of jobs lost. I won’t stand for this. I’ll continue to work with House Democrats to stand up to this reckless, dangerous GOP agenda.

Since its signing, North Carolina's Sixth District and the state have received federal funding for: Improvements to Piedmont Triad International (PTI) Airport, Winston-Salem's Long Branch Trail Extension project, Electric vehicle charging infrastructure statewide, Clean water projects, Bridge repairs, Modernization of Greensboro's bus fleet, And affordable broadband connectivity programs. Read more about federal funding from the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law here .
The April Jobs report further demonstrated that Democrats’ economic plan is working: the nation’s added 12 million jobs over the past two years while unemployment remains at a 50-year low. [[url]]

Nearly 300 rockets have been fired at innocent civilians in Israel by the terrorist group PIJ in Gaza. I am proud to support the lifesaving Iron Dome missile defense system to intercept incoming rockets and protect our ally Israel’s safety and security.

#OnThisDay in 1960, the FDA approved the first birth control pill, advancing women’s equality & improving health outcomes. I’m preparing to reintroduce my #RightToContraception Act to federally enshrine the right to birth control & safeguard birth control from Republican attacks.
